title: Nvidia Competitor Cerebras Shelves IPO Plans Days After Touching $8 Billion Valuation
description: Artificial intelligence chipmaker Cerebras Systems scrapped plans for an IPO on Friday, days after the Nvidia Corp. (NASDAQ: NVDA) competitor announced a fresh fundraising round that sent its valuation up to $8 billion.
content:
Artificial intelligence chipmaker Cerebras Systems scrapped plans for an IPO on Friday, days after the company announced a fresh fundraising round that sent its valuation up to $8 billion.

title: Nvidia, Fujitsu to work together on AI robots and other technology
description: U.S. technology company Nvidia and Fujitsu, a Japanese telecommunications and computer maker, agreed Friday to work together on artificial intelligence to deliver smart robots and a variety of other innovations using Nvidia's computer chips. “The AI industrial revolution has already begun. title: The Inference | AI Enters The Gym, Inside India’s Consumer AI Paradox, And More
description: Artificial intelligence is no longer just about breakthroughs in labs or pumping billions of dollars into data centres — it’s in our hospitals, courtrooms, classrooms, and on the battlefield. At Outlook Business, we believe that India needs a sharp, nuanced, and people-first lens on this transformation.

title: Jeff Bezos Calls AI Boom A Bubble - But Says It's A Good One
description: Amazon.com Inc. (NASDAQ: AMZN) founder Jeff Bezos acknowledged that artificial intelligence is in "a kind of industrial bubble" but stressed that the technology is real and will deliver "gigantic" benefits to society.
content:
Amazon.com Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN) founder Jeff Bezos acknowledged that artificial intelligence is in "a kind of industrial bubble" but stressed that the technology is real and will deliver "gigantic" benefits to society.

title: OpenAI to boost content owners' control for Sora AI video app, plans monetization
description: ChatGPT creator OpenAI will soon introduce controls allowing the owners of content rights to dictate how their characters are used in its AI video-generating tool Sora and plans to share revenue with those who permit such use. The artificial intelligence company will give rights holders "more granular control over generation of characters," Chief Executive Sam Altman posted on his blog on Friday.
content:
ChatGPT creator OpenAI will soon introduce controls allowing the owners of content rights to dictate how their characters are used in its AI video-generating tool Sora and plans to share revenue with those who permit such use.

title: OpenAI’s Fine Print, This Time Sung As A Satiric Opera
description: As part of a group show at Gazelli Art House, artist Jake Elwes turns usage policies from OpenAI and Suno into an absurdist opera generated with artificial intelligence.
content: At first, it sounds like your classic opera — a full-bodied voice infused with gravitas delivers a set of lyrics as a chorus rises and falls, all to an orchestra’s accompaniment. But the words are far too banal to reflect grand opera themes like ambi... [6503 chars]

title: UPDATE 1-Brazilian scammers, raking in millions, used Gisele Bundchen deepfakes on Instagram ads
description: Authorities arrested four suspects tied to the scheme this week and froze assets across five states in an investigation that found over 20 million reais ($3.9 million) in suspicious funds identified by federal anti-money laundering agency COAF. The operation marks one of the first attempts in Brazil to counter the growing use of artificial intelligence tools to manipulate images and videos of celebrities for online scams.
content: A group of suspected scammers in Brazil using Instagram ads featuring deepfakes of supermodel Gisele Bundchen and other celebrities appears to have made millions of dollars through online fraud, according to police investigators. Authorities arrested... [2379 chars]
